Function Documentation

sexp eval ( sexp  expr,
sexp  env 
)

Interpret a lisp expression.

TRoL implements eval in lisp. This implementation is not entirely in lisp because I did not implement quote or cond; they are implemented here by eval.

Parameters:
expr Lisp expression.
env Dictionary of variables in scope.
Returns:
Result of evaluation.
Note:
TRoL adds the entire label expression to the env, I don't know why. This implementation only adds the lambda part.
